mapper.sql: u_id, account, password, reg_date, sex, nick_name, true_name, lv, point, addr_id, exp, addr_num, img
mapper.select: select account from user where account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into user (u_id, account, password, reg_date, sex, nick_name, true_name, lv, point, addr_id, exp, addr_num, img) values (#{uId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lv,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{point,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addrNum,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

u_id,
account,
password,
reg_date,
sex,
nick_name,

addr_num,

mapper.update:
update user
account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reg_date = #{regDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
true_name = #{trueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lv = #{lv,jdbcType=TINYINT},
point = #{point,jdbcType=INTEGER},
addr_id = #{addrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exp = #{exp,jdbcType=INTEGER},
addr_num = #{addrNum,jdbcType=TINYINT},
img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where u_id = #{uId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update user set account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reg_date = #{regDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, true_name = #{trueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lv = #{lv,jdbcType=TINYINT}, point = #{point,jdbcType=INTEGER}, addr_id = #{addrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exp = #{exp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, addr_num = #{addrNum,jdbcType=TINYINT}, img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where u_id = #{uId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
